TEXT.TITLE: CAPITAL ASSOCIATES <CAII.O> TO TRADE ON NASDAQ
TEXT.BODY: Capital Associates Inc said its common stock will be included in NASDAQ's national market system, starting today. Capital Associates is an equipment leasing and financial service company with headquarters in Colorado Springs, Colo. Reuter
